title: Spin, by Robert Charles Wilson (enhanced edit, epub)
description:
SPIN
by Robert Charles Wilson
(.epub format)

Hugo Award Winner for Best Novel 2006

One night in October when he was ten years old, Tyler Dupree stood in his back yard and watched the stars go out. They all flared into brilliance at once, then disappeared, replaced by a flat, empty black barrier. He and his best friends, Jason and Diane Lawton, had seen what became known as the Big Blackout. It would shape their lives. 

"This is the kind of book that makes me feel excited by science fiction all over again. It makes me want to jump up and down and say Ã¢â‚¬Å“Read it, read it, read it!Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ to all my friends."

Text enhanced/improved
----------------------
March 2014: v3.0 - Thorough read by DHR. Several dozen OCR errors corrected, such as "Fuller of life man (-> than) we ever imagined." or "opened his mourn (-> mouth)". Also made significant improvements to chapter formatting and Table of Contents. The text should now be almost 100% true to the treeware.
